name: Millumin
description: The Mac OS software Millumin gained support for (advanced)
light fixtures in version 3. The fixture format is essentially
the OFL format at schema version 7.3.0, with a few additions.
fixtureUsage: Copy the exported fixtures into the library folder and restart
Millumin. For more information, see the Millumin Help link.
additionalInfo: Additions to the OFL format at schema version 7.3.0
